name: Fresh Green Bean Salad
author: Coyote House
summary: This is a crisp, fresh-vegetable salad with a simple oil-and-vinegar dressing.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook beans in boiling water until bright green and slightly tender, 3 to 5 minutes
Drain green beans and plunge into ice water until cold; drain
Toss green beans, radishes, and cucumbers together in a large bowl
Whisk olive oil and vinegar together in a small bowl until the oil emulsifies into the vinegar; season with salt and pepper
Drizzle dressing over salad and toss to coat
